channel.title: sdmpredictors on inSileco
channel.description: Recent content in sdmpredictors on inSileco

item.title: R in Space - Custom mapping
item.description: Creating a thematic map In this post, we go through all the steps required to produce a complete good-looking map. We will see how to add a title, a legend, a scale, axis and a North arrow and choose a good color palette. To do so, we will use the Quebec province as our sampled area. So, first, we import 2 vector layers readily available in R, the Canadian provincial boundaries and USA country boundary.

item.title: Online ecology - Individual species description
item.description: Online ecology Let’s imagine that we are interested in a species in a given area and wish to know as much as possible about it. But, you can’t go out in the field because funding is running short. What we do have, however, is a certain knowledge of the open data science tools that are at our disposal.
